sources.title: Rio Das Mortes (1971)
sources.description: Portuguese subs Michel and Guenther, working in dead-end jobs, are obsessed with going to Peru to find buried treasure, using a map of the Rio das Mortes. Michel's girlfriend, Hanna, humors their plan, but really just wants to get married.

metadata.Plot: Michel and Guenther, working in dead-end jobs, are obsessed with going to Peru to find buried treasure, using a map of the Rio das Mortes. Michel's girlfriend, Hanna, humors their plan, but really just wants to get married.
metadata.Actors: Hanna Schygulla, Michael König, Günther Kaufmann
